Translations.Text: Jevha surya gundaluna ghetala ja'ila
Ani jevha tare nisteja hotila
Ani jevha parvatanna calavile ja'ila
Ani jevha garbhadharaka sandaninna soduna dile ja'ila
Ani jevha hinsra pasunna ekatrita kele ja'ila
Ani jevha samudra bhadakavile jatila
Ani jevha prananna (sarirasi) jodale ja'ila
Ani jevha jivanta gadalya gelelya mulinna vicarale ja'ila
Ki konatya aparadhapayi tyanci hatya keli geli
Ani jevha karma-lekha ughadale jatila
Ani jevha akasaci camadi (avarana) utaravili ja'ila
Ani jevha jahannama bhadakavili ja'ila
Ani jevha jannatala javala anale ja'ila
Tevha tya divasi pratyeka manusya januna ghe'ila, je kahi (sobata) ghe'una ala asela
Mi sapatha gheto mage hatanarya
Calanarya phiranarya, lapanarya taryanci
Ani ratrici jevha ti ja'u lagela
Ani sakalaci jevha cakaku lagela
Nihsansaya, he eka sanmanita sandesavahakace kathana ahe
Jo motha saktisali ahe. Arsaca svami (allaha) cya thayi ucca darjaca ahe
Jyace tethe (akasammadhye) ajnapalana kele jate, (to) amanatadara ahe
Ani tumaca sathidara veda nahi
Tyane tya (pharistya) la akasacya ughadya kinaryavara pahilehi ahe
Ani ha paroksacya gosti sanganyata kanjusahi nahi
Ani ha (kura'ana) dhihkkaralelya saitanace kathana nahi
Maga tumhi kothe jata ahata
He tara samasta visvavasiyankarita bodhapatra ahe
(Khasakaruna tyacyasathi,) jo tumacyapaiki sarala margavara calu icchito
Ani tumhi, sarva visvancya palanakartya (allaha) cya (icche) vina kahica icchu sakata nahi
